tool_description: Get live and future sports betting odds from the european bookmaker Tipico. All results are realtime and in a clean structure!
name: Tipico Sports Betting API
title: Tipico Sports Betting API

api_list.name: Get games with odds for competition
api_list.description: You provide a competitionId and receive all events with their odds. Since this is a high-cost-call the limit if 50 events. If the competition has more than 50 events the API will send an error back.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tipico-sports-betting-api.p.rapidapi.com/all/36301"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tipico-sports-betting-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tipico-sports-betting-api.p.rapidapi.com/all/{competitionid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tipico-sports-betting-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get events for competition
api_list.description: You'll receive all events (with betting options) for the selected competition.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tipico-sports-betting-api.p.rapidapi.com/competition/42301"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tipico-sports-betting-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

api_list.name: Get game odds by tipico id
api_list.description: You'll receive all available odds for a game. You need to provide the tipico id (it's the "id" property of the event object). All odds are provided in decimal and american format.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tipico-sports-betting-api.p.rapidapi.com/game/gameId/566933810"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tipico-sports-betting-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tipico-sports-betting-api.p.rapidapi.com/game/gameId/{gameid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tipico-sports-betting-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get game odds by viperscore id
api_list.description:
You'll receive all available odds for a game. You need to provide the viperscore id (it's the "id" property of our other sports API ViperScore). All odds are provided in decimal and american format.
This can be used for a fluent integration with the ViperScore API.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tipico-sports-betting-api.p.rapidapi.com/game/viperscoreId/11230172"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tipico-sports-betting-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tipico-sports-betting-api.p.rapidapi.com/game/viperscoreId/{viperscoreid}"

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tipico-sports-betting-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: All Active Competitions
api_list.description: You'll receive an array of all supported sports, countries and leagues. For every layer we'll provide meta information like "how many games are in the next 3 hours" or "how many games are live".
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tipico-sports-betting-api.p.rapidapi.com/all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tipico-sports-betting-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
